title: Why didnt I get a mastery token?
body: I played a game the other day and I got a S- on soraka and I didnt get a mastery token. Im level 5 with her.

replies.body:
That's because you got S class with her on ARAM. While you can still get chests from ARAM, champion mastery tokens are limited exclusively to the classic mode on Summoners Rift.

More information on that [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q7).
